import React from "react"; import "../index.css"; import Header from "./Header"; import Main from "./Main"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import ImagePopup from "./ImagePopup"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm"; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setEditProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setAddPlacePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setEditAvatarPopupOpen] = React.useState(false); const [selectedCard, setSelectedCard] = React.useState(); function handleCardClick() { setSelectedCard(true); } function closeAllPopups() { setEditProfilePopupOpen(false); setAddPlacePopupOpen(false); setEditAvatarPopupOpen(false); setSelectedCard(false); } return (
{ setEditAvatarPopupOpen(true); }} onEditProfile={() => { setEditProfilePopupOpen(true); }} onAddPlace={() => { setAddPlacePopupOpen(true); }} />
